name: Furious Miami Speed - Racing And Driving Simulator
name_original: Furious Miami Speed - Racing And Driving Simulator
description:
With golden era muscle cars, tear through the streets of 80's Miami after the sun sets. Each level brings back the fun nostalgia of 1980's Miami, leaving you wanting to repeat levels to see the detail in the game.
Well balanced car physics, focused on fun, provides the right amount of realism mixed with arcade flair to keep you locked in playing.

No In-App Purchases.
Just a good time racing the streets of Miami.

Butterflyware is a small independent video game development studio based in the Czech Republic.
Mainly focused on fair mobile gaming without In-App Purchases.
